segments.text: Hello , hot water overflowed from the bathtub . Would you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you turn off the tap ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then will you put all the towels under the bathroom door .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will have our housekeeper come right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , I was too tired to fall asleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you woke up , the water was coming out the tub ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Can I compensate for the damage with the travel accident insurance ?
segments.speaker: S1
